title: By the King, a proclamation for the apprehending certain offenders therein named and for the better security of His Majesty and his government from dangers arising from popish recusants
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
publisher: Printed by John Bill, Christopher Barker, Thomas Newcomb, and Henry Hills, ...,
notes: "Given at the court at Whitehall, the seventeenth day of November, in the thirtieth year of His Majesties reign."
Reproduction of the original in the Huntington Library.
